battleship.model - package battleship.model
 
BattleshipModel - Interface in battleship.model
Public Model Interface for Battleship game

G

getActivePlayer() - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
getActivePlayer returns the reference of the active player.
getBoard(Player) - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
Returns an array of True/False values that can be mapped to the gamegrid.

getDefensePlayer returns the reference of the defending player.

getShipLocations(Player) - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
Returns an array of all the board Locations the designated player's ships occupy.

I

isGameOver() - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
isGameOver checks to see if a win condition has been met by either player.

M

makeShot(int, int) - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
Once setup mode has ended, the makeShot method is used to make offensive moves.

P

placeShip(String, int, int, int, int) - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
Places a ship on the game board for the player designated as the activePlayer.

R

resetGame() - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
Resets current game and reverts into setup mode.

S

switchActivePlayer() - Method in interface battleship.model.BattleshipModel
Called when a player has finished setup or has fired a shot that missed.
